Functions.html#/s:3CPM2eeoiySbAA4EdgeC_A.abstract: Compare if two edges (edge objects) are equal

Functions.html#/s:3CPM2eeoiySbAA5GraphC_.abstract: Compare if two graphs (graph objects) are equal

Functions.html#/s:3CPM2eeoiySbAA8TaskNod.abstract: Compare if two TaskNode (TaskNode objects) are equal

Extensions/Sequence.html#/s:ST3CPMAA8Tas.name: duration
Extensions/Sequence.html#/s:ST3CPMAA8Tas.abstract: Get the total duration per a collection of TaskNode

Enums/PathType.html.name: PathType
Enums/PathType.html.abstract: An enum to represent a path. A path is either Critical or None

Classes/TaskNode.html#/s:3CPM8TaskNodeC1.name: isVisitted
Classes/TaskNode.html#/s:3CPM8TaskNodeC1.abstract: Indicate if a TaskNode is visitted in a Graph structure or other linked structures

Classes/TaskNode.html#/s:3CPM8TaskNodeC1.name: isOnCriticalPath
Classes/TaskNode.html#/s:3CPM8TaskNodeC1.abstract: Indicate if a TaskNode is on a critical path

Classes/TaskNode.html#/c:@M@CPM@objc(cs).name: description
Classes/TaskNode.html#/c:@M@CPM@objc(cs).abstract: The description of the task is the name of the task

Classes/Path.html#/s:3CPM4PathC6_paths33.name: _paths
Classes/Path.html#/s:3CPM4PathC6_paths33.abstract: A holder for all tasks in a path

Classes/Path.html#/s:3CPM4PathC5pathsSay.name: paths
Classes/Path.html#/s:3CPM4PathC5pathsSay.abstract: All generated paths. Task attributes (such as ES, EF, LS, LF, Slack, isOnCriticalPath) are not calculated

Classes/Path.html#/s:3CPM4PathC13critica.name: criticalPaths
Classes/Path.html#/s:3CPM4PathC13critica.abstract: All critical paths. Task attributes are calculated

Classes/Path.html#/s:3CPM4PathC8generate.name: generate()
Classes/Path.html#/s:3CPM4PathC8generate.abstract: Generate all paths and calculate all attributes

Classes/Path.html#/s:3CPM4PathC6remove33.name: remove(task:allPaths:)
Classes/Path.html#/s:3CPM4PathC6remove33.abstract: Remove a task in a collection of paths of tasks

Classes/Path.html#/s:3CPM4PathC8getPaths.name: getPaths(_:source:)
Classes/Path.html#/s:3CPM4PathC8getPaths.abstract: Search the graph by using Depth-First Search Algorithm to find all paths

Classes/Path.html#/s:3CPM4PathC21calcula.name: calculateCPAttributes()
Classes/Path.html#/s:3CPM4PathC21calcula.abstract: Calculate Early Start (ES), Early Finish (EF), Late Start (LS), Late Finish (LF), and Slack for tasks on critical paths

Classes/Path.html#/s:3CPM4PathC12isolate.name: isolatePaths()
Classes/Path.html#/s:3CPM4PathC12isolate.abstract: This function isolates all the paths into PathType. Paths are either Critical or None

Classes/Path.html#/s:3CPM4PathC20getPath.name: getPathsWithDuration()
Classes/Path.html#/s:3CPM4PathC20getPath.abstract: This function calculates the total duration of each path

Classes/Graph.html#/s:3CPM5GraphC16addSu.name: addSuccessorEdge(_:neighbor:)
Classes/Graph.html#/s:3CPM5GraphC16addSu.abstract: Add a successor task to the current (source) task. This method adds an Edge between the two tasks.

Classes/Graph.html#/s:3CPM5GraphC18addPr.name: addPredecessorEdge(_:neighbor:)
Classes/Graph.html#/s:3CPM5GraphC18addPr.abstract: Add a predecessor task to the current (source) task. This method adds an Edge between the two tasks.

Classes/Graph.html#/s:3CPM5GraphC7getTas.name: getTask(by:)
Classes/Graph.html#/s:3CPM5GraphC7getTas.abstract: Get a task object by its name

Classes/FileObject.html#/s:3CPM10FileObj.name: rows
Classes/FileObject.html#/s:3CPM10FileObj.abstract: All rows of the input without the header

Classes/FileObject.html#/s:3CPM10FileObj.name: convertRowToDictionary()
Classes/FileObject.html#/s:3CPM10FileObj.abstract: Create dictionary for the tasks from rows. Key: is the task name, Value: is an array of task name

Global Variables.html.name: Global Variables
Global Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.
